title: Kobi Electric Expands Sales Team as Product Line Continues to Grow

organizations.name: kobi electric troffer ez upgrade kit

text:
LED industry leader appoints Western Regional Sales Manager As easy-install LED Troffer EZ Upgrade Kit is launched into the market
FORT WORTH, Texas--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Kobi Electric, a leading international commercial and industrial energy efficient lighting manufacturer, has added Arthur “Buzz” Carruth as the company’s Western Regional Sales Manager and announced the launch of the Kobi Electric Troffer EZ Upgrade Kit, the most complete retrofit kit for linear fluorescent light fixtures.
Based in Austin, Texas, Carruth joins Kobi Electric during a time of dynamic growth as the company continues to augment both its product lines and sales network. He comes to Kobi as a veteran of the lighting and electrical product space, and his sales experience is expected to accelerate the development of Kobi’s Western Region that includes Texas, Oklahoma, Colorado, Wyoming, Montana, New Mexico, Arizona, Utah, Idaho, Nevada, California, Oregon and Washington.
Carruth’s arrival coincides with Kobi’s introduction of the LED Troffer EZ Upgrade Kit, the easiest full replacement for fluorescent tubes. These LED troffers are designed and manufactured to the same standard sizes of their fluorescent predecessors, and the LED Troffer EZ Upgrade Kits are rated at a 50,000-hour lifetime. The LED Troffer EZ Upgrade Kits, which do not require above-ceiling access and are virtually no-mess installs, can be installed in minutes and are ideal for health care facilities, hospitals, schools, offices, churches and municipal buildings.
“We’ve always believed our people and our products separate Kobi Electric in the lighting industry, and “Buzz” Carruth will hit the ground running with our LED Troffer EZ Upgrade Kit that has incredible applications in a wide variety of settings,” said Kobi Electric President Nicholas Peragine. “We pride ourselves in our relationships with our Distributors and Sales Representative Agencies, and (Carruth) will continue our efforts to deliver them the best value lighting products that provide cost-effective, efficient lighting solutions for their customers.”
Find more information about Kobi Electric and a full catalog of Kobi Electric’s LED products at www.kobielectric.com .
Kobi Electric
Kobi Electric is a U.S. based LED lighting manufacturer located in Fort Worth, Texas. The company’s goal is to provide quality, affordable lighting products and personal customer service. Kobi Electric designs, engineers, tests and stocks LED bulbs and fixtures at the company’s headquarters in Texas. Kobi products are designed for many applications, including residential, healthcare, education, institutional, churches, hotels, hospitality and warehouses. www.kobielectric.com
